input_args.passage: 'Giuseppe Verdi/Nationality | Italian, Verdi was the major Italian musical dramatist of the nineteenth century, the successor to Bellini, Donizetti and Rossini. Along with Wagner, he was the most important opera composer of the period and received national and international recognition for his powerful stage works., Italian'
input_args.claim: 'Both sources and provide information about Giuseppe Verdi, notably his nationality.'
